articles.title: California governor Gavin Newsom demands UCLA explain how leaving Pac-12 for Big Ten is beneficial

articles.description: James Harden's new deal with the 76ers includes a player option for the 2023-24 season, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski, meaning he could become a free agent again next summer.
